Articles.Content:
Well,I tested my new super speed aircraft,and made a pinnacle of my plane building.This thing I made is awesome,it's very fast,manevourable,and is Jeb approved!

It's name is Delta I.Here are some pictures.

cruisin'

Very good shot

Well,that thing is fast

"Is it normal that it burns?"

DOWNLOAD

Definitely FAST! The positioning of the lift and mass center are different and way behind, making it unstable, but the high speed keeps the flight more or less stable. But landing is tough, the low speed makes the nose of the plane fall.

Definitely FAST! The positioning of the lift and mass center are different and way behind, making it unstable, but the high speed keeps the flight more or less stable. But landing is tough, the low speed makes the nose of the plane fall.

Who cares if it flies safely? Jeb likes it fast.

Edited May 17, 2013 by EvilotionCR2
